TitleEnglish: Detective Conan: Jolly Roger in the Deep Azure
SummaryEnglish: Takagi and Sato chase thieves that robbed a supermarket. The thieves are injured in a car accident. One faints, the other is questioned. He mentions Koumijima (''also'' Koumi Island), and Jolly Roger.
Aliases: Case Closed: Jolly Roger in the Deep Azure
